name: Akemi Space Battleground
description:
fight against the defeat that comes from above but also be careful not to fall to the defeat that comes below... ( theme : As Above so Below )

menage your fighting skills and you spacial awareness to survive this time constrained battle against enemies and an ever shrinking platform

Objective: 

Defeat the maximum amount of waves with increasingly stronger foes, while fighting on top of a shrinking platform.

Losing condition: 

-  When heath points reach 0 

-  When the time reaches 0

-  Falling of the platform

-  If an enemy falls from the platform

Additional information:

 -The character has a slow passive hp regeneration.

- The score is based on wave, time and the amount of hp left

 Tips: at low hp you can choose to sacrifice time and run around for passive healing but be careful this might make you lose some ground.


- 10  waves / Rounds

- 5 min until the platform shrinks completely
